events.message: I reported a car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following the review of the initial report and damage description.
An agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will contact you shortly for further details.
Your claim for the vehicle collision has been acknowledged and is now under active review by our claims team.
Please provide photos of the damage to your vehicle, the police report, and a copy of your driver's license.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and license copy have been submitted for your accident claim.
The investigation into the circumstances of your vehicle collision has begun, including a review of submitted evidence.
Investigation into the accident has been completed and liability has been determined based on the information provided.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs and related expenses from your vehicle collision.
The customer has provided positive feedback regarding the timely handling and communication about the claim process.
Your claim has been approved and we are proceeding to the payment phase to cover the damages to your vehicle.
A payment covering the approved settlement amount has been issued directly to your repair service provider.
The car accident claim has been officially closed as all repairs and payments have been successfully completed.
All records related to your vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
